executive_summary: Revenue growth increased by 14.5% from INR 16,400,000 in 2023 to INR 18,750,000 in 2024.
Profit After Tax increased by 39.1% from INR 1,920,000 in 2023 to INR 2,670,000 in 2024.
The company's cash balance increased by 51.1% from INR 2,250,000 in 2023 to INR 3,400,000 in 2024.
The debt-to-equity ratio decreased from 0.46 in 2023 to 0.39 in 2024, indicating a reduction in debt.
The return on equity (ROE) increased to 20.6% in 2024 from 14.5% in 2023, indicating improved profitability.

top_risks.title: High Debt Levels
top_risks.description: The company's debt levels are high, with a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.39 in 2024.

top_risks.title: Cash Flow Risks
top_risks.description: The company's cash flow from operating activities decreased by 19.2% from INR 3,100,000 in 2024 to INR 2,600,000 in 2023.

top_risks.title: Declining Margins
top_risks.description: The company's profit margins decreased from 11.5% in 2023 to 10.6% in 2024.
